IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
The cast of a play or film
so ljudje, ki igrajo v gledališki igri ali filmu.

seg.quote: The whole cast worked wonderfully together.

sense.def:
To cast an actor
pomeni izbrati nekega igralca za določeno vlogo.

seg.quote: I was cast as the husband, a man of about fifty.

sense.def:
To cast one's eyes somewhere
pomeni nekam pogledati.

seg.quote: He cast a quick glance at his friend.

sense.def:
To cast doubt or suspicion on something
pomeni drugim vzbuditi negotovost o nečem.

seg.quote: He had cast doubt on our traditional beliefs.

sense.def:
To cast one's mind back
pomeni misliti na stvari iz preteklosti ali se jih poskusiti spomniti.

seg.quote: He cast his mind back over the day.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
casts his vote in an election
, glasuje na volitvah.

seg.quote: Will had cast his vote for the President.

sense.def:
To cast an object
pomeni izdelati predmet tako, da zlijemo vročo, tekočo kovino v posodo in jo pustimo, da se strdi.

To cast about
ali
to cast around for something
pomeni poskusiti nekaj najti;

seg.quote: I cast around for some place to hide.
His country cast him aside and disgraced him.
Organizations must cast off old-fashioned practices in order to survive.
We cast off as quietly as we could.
